markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Expert Beast Gunner Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=3232) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 131</row>

**Archetype** [Beast Gunner](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=116)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Beast Gunner Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=3230)

</column>

---

You've learned the deeper secrets of [beast guns](/equipment/beast-guns), making you an expert in the magic they grant you. You gain the [expert spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=170).

<title level="2">Expert Beast Gunner Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Master Beast Gunner Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=3234)
name: Expert Beast Gunner Spellcasting
